title: Saudi Arabia permits alcohol sale for wealthy expats? Eligibility, residency requirements for liquor access in KSA
summary_full: Saudi Arabia has quietly begun selling alcohol to wealthy, non-Muslim foreign residents, a significant shift after over 70 years of prohibition. This move, linked to Vision 2030, targets affluent expats with premium residency and high incomes, signaling a cautious approach to social liberalization aimed at boosting tourism and investment. Further expansion is reportedly planned.
